LoadAudioFromFile(string, AudioType)

Loads a custom audio file as an Audio Clip.

public static UniTask<AudioClip> LoadAudioFromFile(string path, AudioType type)

Parameters

path string

The path to the audio file.

type AudioType

The type of audio file.

Returns

UniTask<AudioClip>

Remarks

Supported audio types include .mp3, .wav, .ogg, and more.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException
ExternalFileLoader.FileLoadFailedException
FileNotFoundException

LoadImageFromFile(string)

Loads a custom image file as a Sprite.

public static Sprite LoadImageFromFile(string path)

Parameters

path string

The path to the image file.

Returns

Sprite

Remarks

Supported image types are jpg, and png.
